mapper.select: select id, concat('[',area,'] ', name,' ',broadband,'Mbps') as name from t_server_tunnel where buy_status = 1

select `id`, `name`, `country`, `area`, `broadband`, `server_addr`, `create_time`, `price_type`, `sales_price`, `original_price`, `buy_status`, `status`, `server_end_time`, server_up_time from t_server_tunnel
and name like concat('%',#{params.name},'%')
order by id asc

select st.`id`, st.`name`, st.`country`, st.`area`, st.`broadband`, st.`server_addr`, st.`create_time`, st.`price_type`, st.`buy_status`, st.`status`, st.`server_end_time`, st.`server_up_time`, (select ifnull(sum(dmd.flow)/1024/1024/1024,0) from data_metrics_day dmd WHERE dmd.server_tunnel_id = st.id) flowIn, (select ifnull(sum(dmd.flow)/1024/1024/1024,0) from data_metrics_day dmd WHERE dmd.server_tunnel_id = st.id) flowOut, (select count(1) from t_device_online ddo where ddo.server_tunnel_id= st.id) as deviceNum , (select count(1) from t_device_online ddo where ddo.server_tunnel_id= st.id) as tunnelNum
from t_server_tunnel st order by st.id desc
